recipe_name: Penne arrabiata with avocado and rocket salad
author: Paul Rankin
method: Place all the ingredients for the pasta into a serving bowl, mixing well to combine the ingredients. For the salad, place all the ingredients on a separate bowl, mixing together well. Serve alongside the bowl of pasta.
ingredients: 125g/4½oz penne pasta, cooked according to packet instructions,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 garlic clove, finely chopped,  ¼ red onion, finely chopped,  ½ tsp dried chilli flakes,  1 tbsp tomato purée,  ½ avocado, stone removed, sliced,  small handful rocket leaves,  1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ tbsp balsamic vinegar
